title: Driven Lust [RTF] ~  Comedy Erotica
description:
This is a new eBook, Driven Lust, by Wayne Stewart -- the outstanding writer/author of the absolutely hilarious Another Yard. It is the first book in an exciting new series that will give other bestselling erotica a run for the moneyÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ and your reading enjoyment Ã¢â‚¬â€œ if you like to laugh!
This is a humor filled story of a hunky college student (James) working his way through school as a limo driver, and trying very hard to avoid any serious attachment with any girlÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ (he needs to study). But his passengers keep forcing themselves on him! Did I mention that his young lady boss, Cathleen, had inherited a several $billion conglomerate business, as well as a giant Mansion for its headquarters! To make things interesting, she also has the hots for James.

You'll love the ditzy young, uneducated Chinese girl, YingÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ a self-initiated submissive, in need of living support, who demands to be JamesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ personal slaveÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ despite his extreme reluctance to the whole idea! She turns out to be a modern day "Lucille Ball and Carol Burnett" rolled into oneÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ a really ditzy and uproariously funny young girl!

She is full of madcap ideas; like running around nude in public most of the time (she does not like clothes!). She also loves to tie other people upÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ to train them. JamesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ sexual adventures are a laugh a minute!
